title: How to Make a 44 Magnum Drink

steps.headline: Pour the light rum into a drink mixer.
Pour the black label rum into the drink mixer.
Pour the Jamaican rum into the drink mixer.
Pour the vodka into the drink mixer.
Pour the pineapple juice into the drink mixer.
Pour the sweet and sour mix into the drink mixer.
Fill a high ball glass with ice.
steps.description: Strain the mixture into the glass.

steps.headline: Top off the drink with the 7-UP.
steps.description: If it's too strong, split into two glasses and dilute each with more 7-UP.

text: Pour the light rum into a drink mixer.  Pour the black label rum into the drink mixer.  Pour the Jamaican rum into the drink mixer.  Pour the vodka into the drink mixer.  Pour the pineapple juice into the drink mixer.  Pour the sweet and sour mix into the drink mixer.  Shake well.  Fill a high ball glass with ice. Strain the mixture into the glass. Top off the drink with the 7-UP. If it's too strong, split into two glasses and dilute each with more 7-UP.
